name: RTCIceParameters.password
description: The RTCIceParameters dictionary's password property specifies the ICE password that, in tandem with the usernameFragment, uniquely identifies an ICE session for its entire duration.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
